department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and delivery of eight (8) emergency propane heaters to Churchill Airport
description: Transport Canada has a requirement for the supply and delivery of eight (8) emergency propane heaters to Churchill Airport.
full_summary:
================================lassian
### Tender Announcement for Emergency Propane Heaters

#### Reference Information

* **Title (English)**: T5056-220035 - Emergency Propane Heaters
* **Title (French)**: Appareils de chauffage au propane d’urgence
* **Reference Number**: WS3612839357-Doc3716040291
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3612839357

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: October 20, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 7, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: November 24, 2022
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: [To be determined]
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

#### Tender Description

* Transports Canada requires the supply and delivery of eight (8) emergency propane heaters to Churchill Airport.
* The heaters will replace the existing electric propane fired emergency backup unit heaters.
* The scope of work includes dismounting and replacing the existing heaters in the Churchill Airport Maintenance Garage – Building G-19 (Maintenance Garage).

#### Selection Criteria

* The selection criteria for this tender are Low Price.
* Bidders must submit their bid and all required supporting documentation by 16:00 EST on December 7, 2022, to be considered responsive.

#### Contact Information

* **departmental contact**: Dino Cavalic, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Email**: dino.cavalic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: [Not available]
* **Fax**: [Not available]

#### Notice URL

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14417943?extsite=MTQ0MTc5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Trade Agreements

* This tender is open to bidders who have a relationship with the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
### Notes

* The tender status of this opportunity is Expired.
* The Regions of Opportunity and Regions of Delivery for this tender are Churchill.
